title: Matt Patricia, Bill Belichick, Sam Darnald, & Aaron Rodgers-Tom Brady
itunes:title: Matt Patricia, Bill Belichick, Sam Darnald, & Aaron Rodgers-Tom Brady
description:
Colin discusses why HC Matt Patrica isn't working out in Detroit, why coaches who leave Bill Belichick continue to fail, why QB Sam Darnold and the New Jets are not a mess, why New England Patriots QB Tom Brady is the GOAT, and more on Green Bay Packers QB Aaron Rogers' injury. Guests include Nick Wright, Joel Klatt, and Albert Breer.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
